entities.name: NVIDIA CORPORATION
entities.description: NVIDIA Corporation is a multinational technology company and a leading manufacturer of graphics processing units (GPUs) and system on a chip units (SoCs) for the gaming, professional visualization, data center, and automotive markets.

entities.name: UNITED STATES
entities.description: The United States is one of the countries where NVIDIA Corporation has significant revenue, accounts receivable, and long-lived assets.

entities.name: TAIWAN
entities.description: Taiwan is one of the countries where NVIDIA Corporation has significant revenue and long-lived assets.

entities.name: CHINA
entities.description: China, including Hong Kong, is one of the countries where NVIDIA Corporation has significant revenue.

entities.name: ISRAEL
entities.description: Israel is one of the countries where NVIDIA Corporation has long-lived assets.

entities.name: GAMING
entities.description: The gaming market is one of the specialized markets served by NVIDIA Corporation, generating significant revenue.

entities.name: DATA CENTER
entities.description: The data center market is one of the specialized markets served by NVIDIA Corporation, generating significant revenue.

entities.name: PROFESSIONAL VISUALIZATION
entities.description: The professional visualization market is one of the specialized markets served by NVIDIA Corporation, generating revenue.

entities.name: AUTOMOTIVE
entities.description: The automotive market is one of the specialized markets served by NVIDIA Corporation, generating revenue.

entities.name: OEM & OTHER
entities.description: OEM & Other is one of the specialized markets served by NVIDIA Corporation, generating revenue.

relationships.relationship_description: NVIDIA Corporation generates significant revenue from the United States and has substantial long-lived assets in the country.
NVIDIA Corporation generates significant revenue from Taiwan and has long-lived assets in the country.
NVIDIA Corporation generates significant revenue from China, including Hong Kong.
NVIDIA Corporation has long-lived assets in Israel.
The gaming market is a major source of revenue for NVIDIA Corporation.
The data center market is a major source of revenue for NVIDIA Corporation.
The professional visualization market generates revenue for NVIDIA Corporation.
The automotive market generates revenue for NVIDIA Corporation.
The OEM & Other market generates revenue for NVIDIA Corporation.
